description: A simple app that receives data wirelessly and notifies a user if the Touch Sensor is being touched. The complimentary Node.js IoT project is visible under Internet of Things (IoT) with Node.js Projects: Start with a Sample or Template.
title: Touch Notifier Companion App
tooltip: A simple app that receives data wirelessly and notifies a user if the Touch Sensor is being touched. The complimentary Node.js IoT project is visible under Internet of Things (IoT) with Node.js Projects: Start with a Sample or Template.
